examples: I wrote a new post for my blog.
She has a successful fashion blog.
Blogs have become a popular form of online communication.
Eu escrevi uma nova postagem para o meu blog.
Ela tem um blog de moda de sucesso.
Blogs se tornaram uma forma popular de comunicação online.

suggested: Why did the blogger break up with the internet? They just didn't have a good connection anymore...it was time to 'blog' off!
The word 'blog' can bring up feelings of loneliness or vulnerability for those who use it as an outlet for their personal thoughts and experiences.
Negative comments or harassment on a 'blog' can be hurtful and frustrating for the writer.
Did you know that the word 'blog' is a shortened form of the term 'weblog', which was coined by Jorn Barger in 1997?
There's no specific smell associated with 'blog', but the scent of something that reminds you of a particular memory or experience can inspire you to write about it on your 'blog'.
There's no physical sensation associated with 'blog', but the feeling of typing out your thoughts and hitting the 'publish' button can be exciting or nerve-wracking.
The concept of 'blog' can be connected to the ideas of self-expression, community building, and the democratization of media.
